name: utopia-php/compression
description: A simple Compression library to handle file compression

suggests.ext-zlib: Needed to use the GZIP adapter
suggests.ext-xz: Needed to use the XZ adapter
suggests.ext-brotli: Needed to use the Brotli adapter
suggests.ext-lz4: Needed to use the LZ4 adapter
suggests.ext-snappy: Needed to use the Snappy adapter
